text: A chinese dialogue about booking a doctor’s appointment.小明：喂，你好！我是小明。小红：你好，小明，请问你有什么事吗？小明：请问今天中午张医生有空吗？小红：张医生中午没空，但是下午有空。小明：好的，我下午去医院找她！谢谢，再见！小红：再见。Xiao Ming: Hello, hello! I am Xiao Ming.Xiaohong: Hello, Xiao Ming, how can I help you?Xiao Ming: Does Dr. Zhang have space to see me at noon today?Xiaohong: Dr. Zhang is not available at noon, but she is free in the afternoon.Xiao Ming: Ok, I will go to the hospital to find her in the afternoon! Thanks, bye!Xiaohong: Goodbye.1 – 小明为什么打电话？a. 找妈妈b. 买东西c. 找医生d. 找老师2 – 张医生什么时候有空？a. 早上b. 下午c. 中午d. 晚上1. c2. bReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
